p: To a suspension of compound 2e in 1,4-dioxane, 1 M aqueous sodium hydroxide was added. The solution was stirred at room temperature for 8 h, and acidified to pH 2â€“3 with 1 M aqueous potassium hydrogen sulfate. The reaction mixture was evaporated and dichloromethane was added, giving a precipitate that was filtered. Then the solvent was evaporated.
